'''''Ignited Adventurer (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (II)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete 10 Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in [[Tezcatepetonco Range]], [[Quahuacan Cliff]], and [[Ochkanatlan]].
